quote: Creativity doesn’t wait for that perfect moment. It fashions its own perfect moments out of ordinary ones.
author: Bruce Garrabrandt

quote: Everything you can imagine is real.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Creativity is just connecting things. When you ask creative people how they did something, they feel a little guilty because they didn’t really do it, they just saw something. It seemed obvious to them after a while.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: You can’t wait for inspiration, you have to go after it with a club.
author: Jack London

quote: Imagination is the beginning of creation. You imagine what you desire, you will what you imagine, and at last, you create what you will.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: If you want creative workers, give them enough time to play.
author: John Cleese

quote: You can’t use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: An essential aspect of creativity is not being afraid to fail.
author: Edwin Land

quote: The true sign of intelligence is not knowledge, but imagination.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: When learning is purposeful, creativity blossoms. When creativity blossoms, thinking emanates. When thinking emanates, knowledge is fully lit. When knowledge is lit, economy flourishes.
author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

quote: There is no doubt that creativity is the most important human resource of all. Without creativity, there would be no progress, and we would be forever repeating the same patterns.
author: Edward de Bono

quote: Creativity is… seeing something that doesn’t exist already. You need to find out how you can bring it into being and that way be a playmate with God.
author: Michele Shea

quote: Everyone who’s ever taken a shower has had an idea. It’s the person who gets out of the shower, dries off, and does something about it who makes a difference.
author: Nolan Bushnell

quote: The creative person is willing to live with ambiguity. He doesn’t need problems solved immediately and can afford to wait for the right ideas.
author: Abe Tannenbaum

quote: Creativity can solve almost any problem. The creative act, the defeat of habit by originality, overcomes everything.
author: George Lois

quote: There’s room for everybody on the planet to be creative and conscious if you are your own person. If you’re trying to be like somebody else, then there isn’t.
author: Tori Amos

quote: The worst enemy to creativity is self-doubt.
author: Sylvia Plath

quote: Invention, it must be humbly admitted, does not consist in creating out of void but out of chaos.
author: Mary Shelley

quote: True alchemy lies in this formula: ‘Your memory and your senses are but the nourishment of your creative impulse.
author: Arthur Rimbaud

quote: Odd how the creative power at once brings the whole universe to order.
author: Virginia Woolf
